name: Octojam 6 Greeting
description:
Octo-jam 2019: A casual Chip8 game jam.

Get ready for Octojam 6!

This title card reprises full-screen  pre-baked animation, using data prepared with a new tool, EZ-Bake Animator: http://beyondloom.com/tools/ezbake.html

View the source in Octo here: http://johnearnest.github.io/Octo/index.html?key=XL6TbGO1
